name: Amalfi Coast Pizzeria and Restaurant Inc
address: 572 Midland Ave, Staten Island, NY 10306, USA

reviews.text:
Ive been eating pizza üçï since John Gotti was a free man. The sauce on the pizza is definitely old school taste, its amazing to say the least. Really brought back memories of the way pizza should taste. I love this place.
#Thepicassoofthieves
Food use to be good went down down hill pizza is extremely thin and floppy the burgers taste like freezer they use fake ingredients. Sad had to turn this way.
Very middle of the pack pizza. Nothing special
Great pizza we feel the love was made in making our pizza. We ha e tried other and nothing comes close to this shop
Had a pepperoni slice, pizza crust was soggy and 10-15 minutes after eating I had to run to the bathroom. Will never go there again.
Fireeeeüî•üî•. I eat here every time I work in the area

Value for money... Authentic Italian
Pizza
My favorite was chicken toll
My go to place for chicken soup and grilled shrimp salad tastes really good!
Exceptional food and service üëåüèΩ
Awesome food eggplant pie delicious
Muy rica la pizza solo que un poco caro
Delicious food Great customer service The spinach and artichoke pizza is bomb as is the baked ziti and meatball. My fiancee and I usually order at  least 2x a month.
Best PIZZA in STATEN ISLAND. SEE SAMMY.

Felt like a neighbor hood gem. Was coming back from practice and had a triple sauce slice(name probably not accurate) was pretty damn good. The chef even made it fresh for us. The dough was soft chewy and crispy all at the same time. Very nice !
Great place to swing in
Best pizza in Staten Island.
Very tasty pizza
Worst place to order food
Great pizza, great food, great service.
Some of the best pizza on staten island
Best pizza I've ever had. They got the best pizza sauce for sure! I drive from NJ just to get pizza from this place.
Lovely buffalo pie. Very friendly staff. Must check it out..
I preferred the vodka square over the plain slice.  The sesame seeds by the crust on the vodka square was a unique touch. 6.5

The owners are very friendly and respectful, even the employees, are never to be busy and welcome customers.  This is always clean, pizza varieties right front, special dishes take time to prepare, well worth the wait. I leave very satisfied always. I go to this place always, especially Fridays I try to get there early to place an order by phone, in person, caus I work at night. Overall, Excellent place. Thank You your service to Midland Beach and beyond. Angel P.

It‚Äôs a shame I used to like their pizza but recently they have a new cook and he is terrible. The pizza was undercooked. The meatballs had no seasoning tasted like straight ground beef. The old man that used to cook was fantastic but the new people that are in there now cooking Need to go to Burger King
Good pizzas
Good
Good pizza place on Midland Ave but nothing special
Delicious chicken and mushroom pizza on the thin crust . Nice and friendly place for pit stop  üòä
To go slices looked so bad we walked without ordering
Great food fast service.

The positive reviews from before October 2019 are for the former pizzeria at this address Big Boys the. It became Cuzzin Joe‚Äôs & now it is Amalfi Coast. The place was empty and the tables needed to be cleaned. A man who wasn‚Äôt working but just watching TV and manning the register seemed to be an owner of some sort. The cook was working harder than the other 2 men in there. The pizza was just okay the sauce needed something to bring a tang out from the tomatoes but at least the pizza was cooked properly. (Big Boys Review: Sauce tastes great! Fried calamari was delicious and crispy and tender LOVED it! Service was fast and staff was friendly and made me feel like family! A great little pizzeria.)
Local, hot, and fresh. Enjoy a slice on the boardwalk!

Small slice for $3.
Crispy, medium thin crust.
Cheese is well cooked, but couldn't taste the sauce.
Plus, it pretty much taste like a grilled cheese slice.
It was okay, but nothing to write home about.
Rate this at 82.
Great Staff!
Stopped buy and had the Special.Two slices and a Coke $5.99 pretty good  Deal these days and was Good pizza
Food is ok service was ok Everything was ok!
Grandma pizza is my best

The best Stromboli in Staten Island, literally could not find anyone that can make a good ‚ÄúStromboli‚Äù the way I always wanted it. Not just the food is great but the service. The owner and staff know how to treat customers. Ecstatic that‚Ä¶

I ordered takeout for a small party at home and the food was delicious! Starting with the antipasto salad which was so fresh and bursting
with flavor! We dug into cheesy, warm garlic bread, then had pepperoni, cheese and vodka pizza‚Ä¶yum! Rigatoni with large and scrumptious
meatballs, penne vodka..so good! Pasta fagioli soup had a nice amount of garlic to give it a kick. The seafood pasta was full of mini clams, mussels,
shrimp & calamari! Next, eggplant rollatini‚Ä¶hit the spot! Dessert was rich- deep fried oreos & zeppoles‚Ä¶super tasty!!! All the portions of food
were very generous, food was fresh and really good!!!
Very nice  half SHRIMP SCAMPI AND HALF SPINACH. very friendly staff.kudos a must try...
Delicious, quality pizza and other finger foods, very friendly staff and the owner. Thank you Amalfi Coast Pizzeria for never disappointing and coming to our neighborhoods.
Amazing pizza love it always fresh great employees very friendly good prices nice pizza spot in midland 10306
We Ordered the Shrimp scampi pie and spinach artichoke pie, good quality pizza, we are stuffed and we got leftovers üëçüèª‚Ä¶
This place was amazing!! Family vibes...good food .. definitely will go back !!!
Spinach slice ..yummy
Excellent Calamari
Amazing Pie Half Ceasar Salad and half Avocado
